name: Dice Quest (thenewgrandmaster, DeliveryPickle, oscoSan, ChobBri, Oceaanic)
name_original: Dice Quest (thenewgrandmaster, DeliveryPickle, oscoSan, ChobBri, Oceaanic)
description:
Instructions

  • Use WASD or the arrow keys to move.
  • Left click to roll your die

Description

Take up your arms and defeat the Dice God in this Dice-Rolling turn-based adventure. 

Each turn you will have 3 moves to heal, guard, attack, OR WARP TIME using your dice (make sure to read the dialogue, there are random effects), and once its over you better hope you can withstand your enemy's assault.

Use the weak enemies to heal up and hope to rn-jesus that the bosses don’t take away all of your grinding and hard work to waste, otherwise, the game will close and its straight back to square one! Good Luck!

Developed by:

  • Brian Cho
  • Oscar San
  • Simon Gartner
  • Ocean Marnoch
  • Indy Ramesh
